hero.title: Conquer the Code
hero.description: Join our thrilling programming contest and showcase your coding prowess. Compete against the best, win amazing prizes, and elevate your skills to new heights.

contest.title: Create Your Own Contests
contest.description: Our platform allows you to create your own coding contests and challenges. Customize the rules, set prizes, and invite participants to compete.

overview.title: Unleash Your Coding Prowess
overview.description: Our programming contest offers a thrilling platform for coders of all levels to showcase their skills, compete against the best, and win amazing prizes.

registration.title: Easy Registration
registration.description: Sign up in minutes and get ready to showcase your coding skills.

challenges.title: Coding Challenges
challenges.description: Tackle a variety of coding challenges that test your problem-solving abilities.

leaderboards.title: Leaderboards
leaderboards.description: Track your progress and see how you stack up against the competition.

contestsPage.title: Explore Exciting Contests
contestsPage.description: Browse through a variety of contests and find the perfect one to showcase your talents.

submission.inProgressDesc: Your code is being submitted. Please wait for the results.
submission.successDesc: Your code has been successfully assessed.
submission.failedDesc: There was an error assessing your code. Please try again.
